gobblin.compaction.suite

Class CompactionAvroSuite

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compaction.suite.CompactionAvroSuite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompactionSuite<FileSystemDataset>

    public class CompactionAvroSuite
extends Object
implements CompactionSuite<FileSystemDataset>
    A type of CompactionSuite which implements all components needed for avro file compaction.

      • createJob

        public Job createJob(FileSystemDataset dataset)
              throws IOException
        Constructs a map-reduce job suitable for avro compaction. The detailed configuration work is delegated to CompactionAvroJobConfigurator.createJob(FileSystemDataset)
        Specified by:
        createJob in interface CompactionSuite<FileSystemDataset>
        Parameters:
        dataset - a top level input path which contains all avro files those need to be compacted
        Returns:
        a map-reduce job which will compact avro files against
        Throws:
        IOException
